# LuckyAds

Provides support for [LuckyAds](https://luckyads.pro/) widgets.

### Required parameters

-   `src`
-   `data-la-block`

## Example

```html
<amp-ad
  width="310"
  height="340"
  type="luckyads"
  data-la-block="0b8b3a05-1061-4362-aefd-019fec9c2e0b"
  src="https://gueobo.com/nhi7l1291/vli0pm3y0hq8768/vqu786pykrin.php"
>
</amp-ad>
```
